Class ButtonGestureInputDriver

All Implemented Interfaces:
InputDriver
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyboardGestureInputDriver, MouseButtonGestureInputDriver
public abstract class ButtonGestureInputDriver
extends AWTInputDriver

Base class for input drivers which translate button/key press events into gesture events.

Method Detail

bind

public void bind(int key,
                 int gesture)
Binds the given key or button to produce the given gesture. If the key is already bound, the old binding is silently overwritten.

pressed

protected void pressed(int code)
Notifies of an input event with the given code.
